Title: Cornell Modeling and Simulation Project Home Page
Body: Overview of the Project The SimLab Software Package Selected Research Activities: Collaborative Mathematics Environments , a research proposal [a postscript version] Guaranteed-Quality Mesh Generation Microstorage Architecture The Weyl computer algebra substrate SPL, a high-level programming language for synthesizing scientific software The Chains Algebraic-Topological Programming Language Selected Presentations: The SimLab Component of the ARPA/NIST MADEFAST Collaborative Design and Manufacturing Exercise.
